column4: not sure. programs sometimes get killed automaticallly when memory runs out.
yes. i'm sure that's what's happening.
the livecd only has a small amount of memory available to it.

you should have all your physical memory available. livecd will also use any swap partition it finds on fixed disks. If all the physical memory is really available, the only solution is to kill memory hogging applications before you run out of memory.
